Bash(# First, let''s backup the current correct data
cp data/metadata/progress.json data/metadata/progress.json.backup

# Move the threads from the nested location to the correct location
mv data/processed/posts/processed/threads/forum_39/* data/processed/threads/forum_39/ 2>/dev/null || true

# Check if there are posts in a nested location
if [ -d ""data/processed/posts/processed/posts"" ]; then
  mv data/processed/posts/processed/posts/* data/processed/posts/
fi

echo ""Files moved. Checking structure..."")

Bash(# Find where the actual post files are
find data/ -name ""*_posts.json"" -type f | head -10)

Bash(# Merge the progress files - the larger one has more data
cp data/processed/posts/metadata/progress.json data/metadata/progress.json

# Clean up the nested directories
rm -rf data/processed/posts/processed/
rm -rf data/processed/posts/metadata/

# Count what we have now
echo ""Thread files: $(find data/processed/threads/ -name ""*.json"" | wc -l)""
echo ""Post files: $(find data/processed/posts/ -name ""*.json"" | wc -l)""
echo ""Total files in data: $(find data/ -name ""*.json"" | wc -l)"")

Bash(# Remove duplicate files and the zip
find data/processed/posts/ -name ""*\(2\).json"" -delete
find data/processed/posts/ -name ""*.zip"" -delete

# Reset and check again
git reset
git add .github/workflows/scrape.yml scripts/commit_helper.py scripts/scraper_with_commits.sh
git add data/processed/
git add data/metadata/

# Remove backup file from staging
git reset data/metadata/progress.json.backup

git status | head -20)
